title: Moody's downgrades rating on $26.8B in Illinois bonds
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
The Moody's credit rating agency downgraded $26.8 billion in Illinois' general obligation bonds on Thursday, prompting another round of fing...
